casebody.data:
No. 10-6551. LaVern Berryhill, Petitioner v. James Hardy Payne, Judge, United States District Court for the Northern District of Oklahoma, et al. 562 U.S. 1107, 131 S. Ct. 849,

178 L. Ed. 2d 554,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9775. December 13, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for reconsideration of order denying leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied.
